DataElement.preferredName: Cancer Patient Tobacco Use Questionnaire 6 How Long Last Smoked Cigarette Category
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated observation of how long it has been since they last smoked a cigarette, including even one or two puffs, using categories that include today to more than one year.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Cancer Patient Tobacco Use Questionnaire How Long Since Last Cigarette
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A questionnaire developed for the baseline and longitudinal assessment of tobacco use in the cancer setting. Domains include cigarette smoking history and current use, use relative to cancer diagnosis and treatment, other tobacco product use, cessation, and second-hand exposure._A question about how long it has been since an individual last smoked a cigarette.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A questionnaire developed for the baseline and longitudinal assessment of tobacco use in the cancer setting. Domains include cigarette smoking history and current use, use relative to cancer diagnosis and treatment, other tobacco product use, cessation, and second-hand exposure.

Concepts.definition: A questionnaire developed for the baseline and longitudinal assessment of tobacco use in the cancer setting. Domains include cigarette smoking history and current use, use relative to cancer diagnosis and treatment, other tobacco product use, cessation, and second-hand exposure.

Property.preferredDefinition: A question about how long it has been since an individual last smoked a cigarette.

Concepts.definition: A question about how long it has been since an individual last smoked a cigarette.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A grouping of items based on some commonality or by user defined characteristics.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Don't Know or Remember When Last Smoked a Cigarette

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Don't Know or Remember When Last Smoked a Cigarette
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual doesn't know and/or remember how long it has been since they last smoked a cigarette.

Concepts.longName: Don't Know or Remember When Last Smoked a Cigarette
Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual doesn't know and/or remember how long it has been since they last smoked a cigarette.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Last Smoked a Cigarette More than One Year Ago

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Last Smoked a Cigarette More than One Year Ago
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that it has been more than one year since an individual smoked a cigarette.

Concepts.longName: Last Smoked a Cigarette More than One Year Ago
Concepts.definition: A response indicating that it has been more than one year since an individual smoked a cigarette.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Last Smoked a Cigarette Less than One Year Ago

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Last Smoked a Cigarette Less than One Year Ago
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that it has been less than one year since an individual smoked a cigarette.

Concepts.longName: Last Smoked a Cigarette Less than One Year Ago
Concepts.definition: A response indicating that it has been less than one year since an individual smoked a cigarette.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Last Smoked a Cigarette Less than One Month Ago

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Last Smoked a Cigarette Less than One Month Ago
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that it has been less than one month since an individual smoked a cigarette.

Concepts.longName: Last Smoked a Cigarette Less than One Month Ago
Concepts.definition: A response indicating that it has been less than one month since an individual smoked a cigarette.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Last Smoked a Cigarette Between One and Seven Days Ago

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Last Smoked a Cigarette Between One and Seven Days Ago
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that it has been between one and seven days since an individual smoked a cigarette.

Concepts.longName: Last Smoked a Cigarette Between One and Seven Days Ago
Concepts.definition: A response indicating that it has been between one and seven days since an individual smoked a cigarette.

PermissibleValues.value: I smoked a cigarette today (at least one puff).

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual smoked at least one puff of a cigarette today.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual smoked at least one puff of a cigarette today.

ClassificationSchemes.longName: Division of Cancer Control and Population Sciences

ReferenceDocuments.name: How long has it been since yo
ReferenceDocuments.description: How long has it been since you last smoked a cigarette (even one or two puffs)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: C-TUQ Instruction
ReferenceDocuments.description: First check which one of the following choices applies to you. Then, if applicable, write a number on the line for how many days, weeks, months, or years it has been since your last cigarette.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Using PRO/HRQoL Measures
ReferenceDocuments.description: This data element is part of a full set of items that comprise a PRO/HRQoL measure. The full set must be used without any changes to the questions or value sets in order to retain the validity and reliability associated with the measure. Changes may not be made to these CDEs.
